info.name: BuddyDesk - Forgot Password API
info.description: API collection for testing forgot password functionality with email OTP verification

request.description: Sends a 6-digit OTP to the user's email address. OTP expires in 10 minutes.

response.name: Success Response
User Not Found

request.description: Verifies the OTP and returns a reset token. Maximum 5 attempts allowed.

response.name: Success Response
OTP Expired

request.description: Resets the user's password using the verified reset token. All sessions are invalidated.

response.name: Success Response
Token Expired
